[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. InterestPaidAdditionalOperatingDisclosure, InterestReceivedAdditionalOperatingDisclosure All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
If the item is an additional disclosure in the cash flow statement then make sure that is included as a child of DisclosureOfCashFlowStatementExplanatory or the extension abstracts SupplementalCashFlowInformationAbstract, CashFlowNoncashInvestingAndFinancingActivitiesDisclosureAbstract, NoncashInvestingAndFinancingItemsAbstract, NonCashOperatingAndFinancingActivitiesAbstract, NonCashOperatingAndInvestingActivitiesAbstract, NoncashFinancingItemsAbstract or NoncashInvestingItemsAbstract.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [220000] Statement of financial position, order of liquidity but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:IssuedCapital All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [220000] Statement of financial position, order of liquidity includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:Equity of 27,050,000,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 16,830,000,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -6. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:Equity that should add to 27,050,000,000 are comprised of the following:
+ RetainedEarnings 16,707,000,000 + StatutoryReserve 102,000,000 + OtherReservesOtherThanStatutoryReserve 21,000,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for [220000] Statement of financial position, order of liquidity. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:Equity Total Value : 27,050,000,000 Total period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -6 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/I6USJ58BDV2BO5KP3C31/2020-12-31/ESEF/CZ/1/I6USJ58BDV2BO5KP3C31-2020-12-31.zip/mmb-vyrocni-zprava-2020-en/reports/I6USJ58BDV2BO5KP3C31-2020-12-31.xhtml 23414
